## Public Member Functions

### getDeclaration() {#a73dcb7f71995caabd3f022bb6489b8de}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual Function &#42; llvm::TargetIntrinsicInfo::getDeclaration (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M, unsigned ID, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;&#42; Tys=nullptr, unsigned numTys=0) const</>}>
Create or insert an LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> declaration for an intrinsic, and return it.

The Tys and numTys are for intrinsics with overloaded types. See above for more information.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/target/targetintrinsicinfo-h/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/target/targetintrinsicinfo-h">TargetIntrinsicInfo.h</a>.

### getName() {#a8294593b54352497d463272d9c268fcd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual std::string llvm::TargetIntrinsicInfo::getName (unsigned IID, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;&#42; Tys=nullptr, unsigned numTys=0) const</>}>
Return the name of a target intrinsic, e.g.

&quot;llvm.bfin.ssync&quot;. The Tys and numTys parameters are for intrinsics with overloaded types (e.g., those using iAny or fAny). For a declaration for an overloaded intrinsic, Tys should point to an array of numTys pointers to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a>, and must provide exactly one type for each overloaded type in the intrinsic.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/target/targetintrinsicinfo-h/#l00042">42</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/target/targetintrinsicinfo-h">TargetIntrinsicInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isOverloaded() {#a04aeb72fda87bffe6bc5ece9ae0e3bec}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="virtual bool llvm::TargetIntrinsicInfo::isOverloaded (unsigned IID) const">
Returns true if the intrinsic can be overloaded.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/target/targetintrinsicinfo-h/#l00057">57</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/target/targetintrinsicinfo-h">TargetIntrinsicInfo.h</a>.

### lookupName() {#a567167c8797f429ca7e8c2ca0fb502e0}

Look up target intrinsic by name.

Return intrinsic <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> or 0 for unknown names.
